36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik narrated that a man among his companions was dying so he said- meaning a man said to him:"Glad tidings of Paradise." To which the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said: "You do not know. Perhaps he spoke of what did not concern him or he was greedy with that which would not decrease him

chapter.eng-name: Among The Excellence Of A Person's Islam Is His Leaving What Does Not Concern Him
